prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a mischievous grin.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a humanoid monkey with green accents and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends into forest environments, using its agility to evade capture.
Design a Pokemon that uses its powerful arms for both combat and climbing trees.
Give me an agile creature that embodies the essence of stealth and strength in battle.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats, with a body built for speed and agility.
Make a Pokemon that showcases a combination of dark fur and vibrant green features.
